name: client-app.toml

platform.name: ElderCare Client
platform.description: Mobile app for clients to order and track care services

rawContent:
# Client Application Platform
# For clients ordering care services

[platform]
id = "client-app"
name = "ElderCare Client"
type = "mobile"
description = "Mobile app for clients to order and track care services"

[platform.config]
baseRoute = "/prototype/client"
theme = "light"
primaryAction = "Order Service"

[platform.features]
core = [
  "Order care services",
  "Track order status",
  "View order history",
  "Leave reviews"
]
auth = "phone-optional"  # Can order without registration

[platform.navigation]
type = "bottom-nav"
items = [
  { id = "home", icon = "Home", label = "Home" },
  { id = "orders", icon = "ClipboardList", label = "My Orders" },
  { id = "history", icon = "Clock", label = "History" }
]

[relations]
routes = ["client-home", "client-order-form", "client-login"]
roles = ["client", "visitor"]
guards = ["public"]
useCases = ["create-order", "track-order", "authenticate-phone"]
